message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $100. It's a good deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept, Bob. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $98. It's a fair deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. It's the lowest I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
